captions.text:
I DON'T THINK YOU GUYS GOT THE GUTS TO PULL
THE TRIGGER.
I'M NOT AFRAID TO USE THIS THING.
>>HOW LONG DO YOU THINK WE HAVE BEFORE HE REALIZES

>>I'VE CALLED THE COPS AND THEY'RE ON THEIR
WAY SO WE JUST
HAVE TO KEEP HIM BUSY FOR A FEW MINUTES UNTIL THEY GET HERE.
WE WERE JUST TALKING ABOUT WHAT HAPPENED TO   THE LAST GUY

MY HUSBAND BIT OFF HIS HAND AND THEN MADE
HIM LOOK AT IT
AND THEN SLAPPED HIM FOR DAYS- >>OKAY HONEY, HONEY.
I LOVE YOU, BUT LET ME HANDLE THIS.
I'M NOT AFRAID OF YOU GUYS.
I'M JUST GOING TO WALK RIGHT OUT OF HERE.
I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU ACTUALLY DID IT.
THE MOST VALUABLE THING YOU GOT IN THIS DUMP
NOW YOU'RE SEVERELY INJURED SO JUST WAIT THERE AND WHEN THE
COPS ARRIVE THEY'LL GIVE YOU THE PROPER MEDICAL ATTENTION.
>>OH MAN, I CAN HARDLY FEEL IT ANYMORE.
THAT CAN'T BE A GOOD SIGN.
YOU SHOT ME AGAIN ARE YOU KIDDING ME?
>>WHAT KIND OF SICK PSYCHO-PATH SHOOTS A MAN TWICE IN
>>THE MORE YOU PANIC THE MORE YOU BLEED.
I HAD MINE REMOVED WHEN I WAS 12.
>>LISTEN, WE ARE ALL UNDER A LOT OF STRESS.
I MUST HAVE SOME SORT OF QUICK HEALING POWER.
THE WOUNDS HAVE COMPLETELY HEALED THEMSELVES.
NOW THEY JUST LOOK LIKE REALLY BAD WELTS.
WE'RE PASSED THE POINT OF NO RETURN.
OH, YOU THINK YOU'VE WON MORTALS?
WAIT UNTIL MY CLAWS GROW IN AND I BREAK THE PRISON WALLS
OH, IT HURTS SO MUCH WORSE NOW!
APPARENTLY MY LEG MUSCLE DOES NOT HAVE
>>JUST STOP SCREAMING WE'LL GET YOU TO A HOSPITAL.
MY BLOOD IS NO LONGER BRIGHT YELLOW!

screamed, so my mom came and pulled a gun on him. (I have no clue where

and I notices that it was him so I screamed again, then my sister (who had 
been in the corner) said merry Christmas and Jason pulled out of his pocket 
tickets to go see studio C live﻿

determined there's not much you can do except aim for the eyes.

comments.author: VelaToNorma7

comments.text:
+VelaToNorma7
*sighs* I was going to let you live in your ignorance, but here we go.

I'm not even going to try with the "choking our an elderly person" thing. 
 But no matter how misinformed you are, using the word "faggot" is 
absolutely NOT ok.  Any number of other words would have sufficed, "idiot," 
 "weabo," "worse than VelaToNorma7."  
Let's try it: "Go back to watching your anime, idiot."  There, now you've 
offended me just as little as you did last time, but you avoided insulting 
the entire homosexual population too.  Next time you rage at me you can do 
it correctly.
